  • Constructor Details

    • UserListManager

      public UserListManager(int maxRegistered, int maxWaitlist)
      This initializes the 3 different types of user lists associated with an event and a random object. It defines and saves the max number of people who can be registered. It defines and saves the max number of people who can join the waitlist.
      Parameters:
      maxRegistered - The max number of people of who can register/enroll
      maxWaitlist - The max number of people who can join the waitlist

    • UserListManager

      public UserListManager(int maxRegistered)
      This initializes the 3 different types of user lists associated with an event and a random object. It defines and saves the max number of people who can be registered. It defines and saves the max number of people who can join the waitlist as the max Integer Value.
      Parameters:
      maxRegistered - the max number of people who can register/enroll

    • declineInvite

      public void declineInvite(com.example.beethere.User user)
      This changes the status of the user in the invite list from Boolean True (has not accepted or declined invitation) to Boolean False (has declined invitation)
      Parameters:
      user - the user whose status is to be change
